Reviews.Content: I had to check out early and they refused to refund my 2 weeks cash prepaid I paid one month in advance in cash. I stayed one week and had to check out early. I gave notice but they refused to refund my 3 weeks cash prepaid. The reason they told me is they do not give refunds once the money has been paid. Intown Suites is a small family owned business that will steal from you. I would strongly advise taking your business elsewhere. In my 50 years on this planet, I have never come across a business that has refused to refund your money and apparently does not care about what you think based on the other similiar posts that I have read. These guys are nothing but thieves and hide behind the desk clerks to do the dirty work. You can bet I will see them in court.
Reviews.Author: A TripAdvisor Member
